articles.description: With Kentucky missing an edge, along with a couple of pieces, could the reeling Wildcats miss the NCAA tourney for the second time under John Calipari?
articles.headline: Is this John Calipari's most disappointing Kentucky team ever?

images.caption: John Calipari has looked for ways to reach his young Kentucky team but hasn't found one yet.
images.name: John Calipari [576x324]

articles.description: Have Oklahoma's recent troubles made Trae Young not a sure thing for the Wooden Award? Arizona's Deandre Ayton is among the players who might get another look.
articles.headline: Wooden Watch: Can someone catch Trae Young?

images.caption: Seth Greenberg explains why Collin Sexton's game will translate better in the NBA than Trae Young's.
images.name: Greenberg would take Sexton over Young for NBA

articles.description: Ayton's rare combination of productivity, NBA-ready physique and upside have him neck-and-neck with Luka Doncic as the top prospect in this year's NBA draft. What questions does he need to answer?
articles.headline: Why isn't Deandre Ayton the clear favorite for the No. 1 draft pick?

images.caption: How good is Deandre Ayton's case for No. 1?
images.name: Deandre Ayton [608x342]

images.caption: Arizona freshman Deandre Ayton continues to show why not only is he a force in the paint, but is one of the best players in college basketball.
images.name: Ayton's explosiveness spicing up the Widcats

articles.description: Ohio State alum Evan Turner comes calling for the $100 Draymond Green owes him for the Buckeyes' victory against Michigan State.
articles.headline: Draymond pays off his bet to Turner

images.caption: Ohio State alum Evan Turner comes calling for the $100 Draymond Green owes him for the Buckeyes' victory against Michigan State.
images.name: Draymond pays off his bet to Turner

articles.description: Sophomore Nolan Narain came off the bench to score a career-high 18 points and fellow reserve Jordan Schakel had 14 points for San Diego State, which raced to a 23-point lead before holding off Wyoming 87-77 Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Reserves Narain, Schakel spark SDSU to 87-77 win vs Wyoming

articles.description: Kendall Stephens tied his career-high with 21 points and Caleb Martin also had 21 to lead No. 24 Nevada past Boise State 77-72 on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: No. 24 Nevada beats Boise State 77-72

images.caption: Kendall Stephens pulls up from deep and knocks down a 3 to tie the game at 27-27.
images.name: Nevada's Stephens shows range to tie game

videos.description: KiShawn Pritchett has a little space and knocks down a three to put Davidson ahead early against UNC.
videos.headline: Davidson's Pritchett buries triple

videos.description: Rusty Reigel hits a 3-pointer to put the Wildcats up 14-7 over the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: Davidson's Reigel knocks down a three

videos.description: Kellan Grady comes away with the rebound and pulls up at the free throw line for the jumper.
videos.headline: Davidson's Grady pulls up in transition

videos.description: Brandon Robinson capitalizes off a Theo Pinson block with a bucket in transition.
videos.headline: UNC's Robinson scores in transition

videos.description: Kellan Grady pump fakes and hits a long two for the Wildcats.
videos.headline: Davidson's Grady fakes out defender for jumper

videos.description: Joel Berry II knocks down a 3-pointer for the Tar Heels to put them ahead by five.
videos.headline: UNC's Berry buries a 3

videos.description: Kenny Williams gets the easy bucket after a beautiful assist from Theo Pinson.
videos.headline: UNC's Pinson drops dime to Williams

videos.description: Jon Axel Gudmundsson gets the tough bucket to go after taking contact to make it a one-possession game for the Wildcats.
videos.headline: Davidson's Gudmundsson goes high off the glass for score

videos.description: Kellan Grady rejects Luke Maye as the Wildcats are hanging tight with the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: Davidson's Grady comes up with huge block

videos.description: Theo Pinson helps UNC extend their lead with a big and-1.
videos.headline: UNC's Pinson gets bucket and a foul

videos.description: Luke Maybe comes up with the offensive rebound and slams it for the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: UNC's Maye slams home offensive rebound

videos.description: Roy Philpott and Jason Capel breakdown UNC's 85-75 win over Davidson.
videos.headline: Berry, Maye lead UNC to victory
